
# browser-switch ![browser-switch-icon - 24](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/398b09ba-acd2-4dde-ac4a-1e7383677b6e)

[„Äê‰∏≠Êñá„Äë](README-zh.md)Automatically open URL links in different browsers. Configurable. 

![browser-switch](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/923dc20d-bf6b-4707-b20d-ead587a7fb94)

---

## Feature ‚ú®

- Easy to use
- Configurable

---

## Installation üì¶

1. Download the zip: [browser-switch-win-64.zip](https://github.com/lilinfangrelax/browser-switch/releases)
2. Unzip to the **English directory** (Don't support Chinese or Other non-English directory)
3. Click the `browser-switch.exe`
4. Follow the software prompts to** install the registry** and set it as **default browser applications**

---

## Usage üõ†Ô∏è

Click the exe program.

Can configure any regular expression rules use `router.txt`
```
ÔªøRULE_NAME            :: REGEX_PATTERN           :: BROWSER_EXE_PATH                                      :: PARAMS
Test Environment     :: uat-exam8ple            :: C:\Program Files\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe :: --profile-directory="Profile 1"
Route ALL            :: github                  :: C:\Program Files\Mozilla Firefox\firefox.exe          :: 
Route ALL            :: .*                      :: C:\Program Files\Google\Chrome\Application\chrome.exe :: --profile-directory="Default"
```
